oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Gas warfare; Poisons; War damage; Campaigns & battles; World War, 1914-1918
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Aerial photograph of a gas attack on the Western Front. The gas, released from canisters, can be seen streaming across no man's land.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Karl Kleeman World War I Photographs
